issue.title: Model Editor: Editing relative pose in joint creation dialog resets all fields

content.raw: Once this is fixed, we need to update the Beginner Model Editor tutorial to remove the extra steps we added to get around the bug (i.e. closing the joint creation dialog and reopening the link inspector to make all of the wheel and caster alignments)
content.html: Once this is fixed, we need to update the Beginner Model Editor tutorial to remove the extra steps we added to get around the bug (i.e. closing the joint creation dialog and reopening the link inspector to make all of the wheel and caster alignments)
